verbose_text: GLP-1 secretion from organoid cultures was stimulated by 10 mM glucose in the absence or the presence of 10 muM forskolin (XREF_FIG K), and impaired by the SGLT1 inhibitor phloridzin (5 muM; XREF_FIG L), suggesting the involvement of an SGLT1 dependent glucose sensing pathway underlying GLP-1 release from organoid derived human L-cells.
